bio.summary: IT Product Manager with a proven track record of applying agile methodology to continuously evolve products to delight customers.
highlights: Skilled facilitator with a passion for inspiring teams to deliver innovative solutions.
Excellent analytical skills with demonstrated ability to transform qualitative and quantitative data into actionable insights.
Entrepreneurial mindset with a bias for customer focused innovation.
Managerial experience designing professional development programs to elevate associates' skillsets.
Demonstrated ability to identify market opportunities, plan strategic initiatives, and execute towards established objectives.

experience.title: Director of Product Management
achievements: Conducted market analysis and developed business case frameworks to assess the viability of new offerings.
Established cooperative partnerships with Product Area Leaders and consulted with subject matter experts across Finance, Market Research, and Strategy.
Synthesized 'voice of the client' inputs and developed client segmentation frameworks to inform adoption and delivery strategies.
Facilitated capability sizing sessions and collaborated with senior leadership to articulate strategic outputs.
Designed and executed a squad lead cohort training program, empowering 15 squad leaders.
Partnered with procurement teams for vendor analysis and cost-benefit models.

experience.title: Product Manager
achievements: Led delivery of a reusable error handling platform, addressing 10% of raised defects.
Simplified complex client configurations with new data flow diagrams.
Established a professional development forum for subject matter experts.
Identified 22% of team's enhancements through incident management reporting.

experience.title: Digital Product Owner
achievements: Leveraged customer insights to develop an event-driven notification platform to digitize the 'awareness' stage of the customer journey.
Utilized SiteCatalyst, ClickTale, and OpinionLab to identify unmet customer need, driving backlog prioritization and maximizing value.
Designed and facilitated an organization-wide workshop to identify and build consensus for customer-driven inputs to influence backlog prioritization.
Partnered with Salesforce Marketing Cloud for on-demand notifications.
Produced informative music video describing new operating model (1.5k+ views).
Accolades: 2017 ShipIt Day award finalist.

experience.title: BA Team Lead & Product Owner
achievements: Digitized product offerings within existing digital ecosystem (ABLE accounts, TEM plans), creating $102M in inflows.
Developed 'BA in a Box' to assist Ship It Day Teams, streamlining release planning.
Implemented process to reduce acceptance test window of new enhancements from 3 days to 1 hour.
Led a 5-member BA team in instituting best practices for requirement gathering, resulting in a 30% faster time to market.
Managed offshore team to integrate 401k and retail plans, driving $102M in inflows.

experience.title: Senior Business Analyst
achievements: Consolidated customer metrics to provide holistic feedback along the customer journey.
Winner of the 2015 Excellence Award for outstanding teamwork.

experience.title: Business Analyst
achievements: Led an offshore team to deliver a digital experience for distributing research analyst reports.
Documented objectives, use cases, and data specifications.
Created complex logical data models and metadata business rules.

projects.title: Achiever's Network Flash Consulting
projects.description: Enhanced online presence and made website conversion-friendly. Increased awareness on social media platforms.

projects.title: Counterparty NGR Project
projects.description: Project focused on risk and counterparty data management.

projects.title: CRS/Research Browser
projects.description: Event Notification Project. Digitized research report distribution.

projects.description: Fidelity.com Portfolio Summary enhancement and modernization.

projects.title: Proactive Notification
projects.description: PI Project to digitize the 'awareness' stage of customer journey.

projects.description: Reusable platform addressing 10% of raised defects across suite.

projects.title: Digital Onboarding
projects.description: Streamlined client onboarding via simplified data flows.

projects.description: Professional development forum for subject matter experts.

projects.title: Agile Transformation
projects.description: Adoption of Agile principles and 'BA in a Box' development.

projects.title: Beta Delivery Platform
projects.description: Safely expose customers to experimental products.

projects.description: Voice of the Client synthesis and segmentation frameworks.

projects.title: Legal Review Workflow
projects.description: Scaled best practices working model across the organization.

projects.title: Workplace 401k Integration
projects.description: Integrated digital platform for workplace and retail plans.
